response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value for us and is tailored to meet your specific needs. Our product offers unparalleled benefits and capabilities that will undoubtedly enhance your business operations significantly. Given its unique features and the market demand, we believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its true worth and the exceptional value it brings to you, we are offering this product to you for $1,400,000. This price reflects our commitment to fair trade while ensuring a substantial return on our investment. We are confident that this offer presents a mutually beneficial arrangement. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1400000}
